attributes.action: Postgraduates who never received Student Loan to be able apply for Student loan
attributes.additional_details: Parliament and Department of Education decide who are eligible for Student loan and they have exempt postgraduate graduates who have self-funded their previous studies. They should get the opportunity to apply for a Student loan if they want start another course that help them professionally
attributes.background: Student loan service doesn’t allowed students with a postgraduate title to apply for loan,no matter if they never received one.Students that self-fund their studies should be eligible to do apply for a loan if they want to do another course.It’s unfair to be exempted when nonUK residents can do it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Taught postgraduate students are already entitled to a loan - you can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/masters-loan
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
